numbered_ace_sentences: 1. Some applicants come from a higher income background.
2. Some applicants have a legacy status.
3. Applicants who come from a higher income background and have a legacy status have higher chances of acceptance into universities.
4. Some applicants come from a lower income background.
5. Some applicants do not have a legacy status.
6. I wonder how this process affects the acceptance rates of applicants who come from a lower income background and do not have a legacy status.
7. This process relates to my community and me.
8. My community and I share a belief.
9. The belief is that the acceptance process should give an equal chance to all applicants.
10. The belief is that the acceptance process should give an equal chance to all applicants regardless of financial background.
11. The belief is that the acceptance process should give an equal chance to all applicants regardless of legacy status.
12. The headline is: Prepare for the Unfair Truth Behind College Admissions.
